Action.Str: Tap here and change to the unique first portion of your nightscout url

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: Simple Mode: true Json: %NIGHTSCOUTENTRIES Fields: sgv(),trend,direction,date Json Root Variable: NightscoutBG Separator: ,
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%date Json Values Values of the fields you got from the json text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%direction Json Values Values of the fields you got from the json text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%nightscoutbg Json Root The whole json object that was used as input</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%sgv() Json Values Values of the fields you got from the json text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%trend Json Values Values of the fields you got from the json text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%err Error Code Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%errmsg Error Message Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6></StringArray>
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.extras.VARI: Json Field Separator JsonRootVariable plugininstanceid plugintypeid
